patterns: Tell me some information for covid19?
responses: In COVID-19, ‘CO’ stands for ‘corona,’ ‘VI’ for ‘virus,’ and ‘D’ for disease. Formerly, this disease was referred to as “2019 novel coronavirus” or “2019-nCoV”.
COVID-19 is circulate thought person to person, mainly through respiratory droplets produced when an infected person coughs, sneezes, or talks.

patterns: Is any evedence that covid19 transmission through food?
responses: There is no evidence to support transmission of COVID-19 associated with food

patterns: Is covid19 spread by mosquitoes or ticks?
responses: CDC has no data to suggest that  coronaviruse is spread by mosquitoes or ticks.

responses: emergency medical attention when Trouble breathing, Persistent pain or pressure in the chest, confusion, Inability to wake or stay awake, Bluish lips or face
